title: The World Is Feeding America: Thanks, Biden | Guest: Carol Roth | 5/23/22
description:
Glenn and Stu discuss the embarrassing move of baby formula from Europe being shipped to America. Glenn and Stu discuss the horrors that the World Economic Forum hopes to implement in America. Glenn and Stu share their thoughts on Bill Maher's latest "controversial" monologue regarding the number of people in the LGBTQ+ community. Glenn and Stu discuss the monkeypox disease and how it seems to be spread. Glenn and Stu discuss America's new dependency on food from other countries. Former investment banker Carol Roth joins to discuss the possibility of America heading toward a recession. Glenn gives Stu a recap of the stories he missed that were not good news for the Biden administration.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
